name: Denari Combat Demo
description:
A surprise invasion by the Denari empire leaves a peaceful tribe hopeless to resist. That is until their goddess imbues a child with her strength. You are their only defense against a relentless foe. Trick enemies into hurting allies by dodging their attacks, catch magicks and deflect them back. Slash, dash and blast through this beautifully alien cartoon world.

Follow us on Twitter and join our Discord channel!

By Shrikkanth Sreedharan, Isabelle dela Torre and Tamihana Greaves.
